content.title: 🎁 Free Tumbler | Project We Love | Something Cool on Kickstarter 💚
content.creator:
Nocpix
March 26, 2025
content.content:
🎁 120k Perk: Free Tumbler!
We hit $120,000! As a thank you, all backers will receive a free Nocpix Auto customized tumbler. Your support made this possible! Get your perks now if you haven't yet.
💚 Project We Love: We Did It!
We're so honored to win the "Project We Love" reward from Kickstarter! Our heartfelt thanks to each of you. We'll continue to make NS7 better.
👀 Cool Kickstarter Projects 
Check out these innovative projects below, they are:
1️⃣ Lofree Hypace: World's First Built-On-Frame Ultralight Mouse
Meet Lofree Hypace: the World's First Built-On-Frame, 47g Ultralight Mouse. Enjoy top-tier performance and exceptional comfort for seamless work and play.
✅ Top-Tier Performance
✅ PAW3950 Sensor; Dual 8K Polling Rate; DPI range of 50–40,000; 50G Acceleration
✅ Built-on-Frame Structure
✅ Sleek Curves Aesthetics
✅ 2.4G & Bluetooth & Type-C
✅ Breathing ARGB Receiver
✅ Up to 80Hrs Battery Life
Elevate Your Performance – Get Your Hypace Now!
2️⃣ TiSpanner 3.0: Enhanced Titanium Multitool
✅ Stronger Torque 
| Extended and thickened design for high-intensity tasks.
✅ More Comfortable Grip 
| Enlarged handle for a steadier, more ergonomic hold.
✅ Built-in Magnetic Bit Holder 
| Dual-direction compatibility for quick switching.
✅ Optimized Staple Remover 
| V-shaped groove for improved grip and easy nail removal.
✅ 7 Nut Size Markings 
| Fast matching for efficiency and convenience.
✅ Wider Measurement Range 
| Upgraded to 50mm for greater precision and versatility.
✅ Larger Grinding Area 
| Enhanced usability for more scenarios.
Unleash your potential with TiSpanner 3.0 – grab yours now!

content.title: 🎁 FREE Toolbox | FB LIVE Replay | Review Video Release 🎥
content.creator:
Nocpix
March 16, 2025
content.content:
｜FREE Toolbox Release 🎁 
We hit $80K! 🎉 Huge thanks to our incredible backers. As promised, a FREE toolbox is now unlocked for EVERYONE! 
Back Us Now If you haven’t.
｜FB LIVE Replay 🎥
Missed our night driving live stream? No worries! Click below to watch the replay and see how NS7 works on the road!
｜Review Release 👀
Wondering what others think of NS7? 🤔 Check out our new review video! See what Mike has to say!

content.title: 🎉 100% Funded | 5% Cashback | 24Hrs Flash Sale | Facebook Live Streaming 🔴
content.creator:
Nocpix
March 12, 2025
content.content:
| 100% Funded 🎉
We’re thrilled to announce that we reached our funding goal on the first day we launched! This is a huge milestone for NS7 and Nocpix Auto team.
A BIG THANK YOU to all of you! Each and every one of you has helped make this happen!  💙😆
| 5% Cashback Referral Event 💰
To show our appreciation, we’re launching an exclusive Kickbooster Event! 
💡 How it works?
Click here & get started.
Sign up on Kickbooster for free. (It takes less than 1 minute)
Share your custom booster link through social media, email, your website, blog, etc.
Sit back, relax, and enjoy the cash piling up for every successful pledge you bring in.

| 24Hrs Flash Sale ⏳
We're excited to announce that our Super Early Bird Reward is officially SOLD OUT! 
Missed your chance? Don't worry—we’ve got something special for you!
🌟 24-Hour Flash Sale – $399 (43% OFF) 🌟
Don’t miss out—grab NS7 at this incredible price before it’s gone!
 Grab yours now.
    | NS7 Facebook Live Streaming 🎥
Curious about NS7's real-world night vision? We've got you!
Join our LIVE Facebook event on March 13th, 9 PM EST for an in-depth showcase & Q&A. See NS7 in action on the road and get all your questions answered.
Don't miss out! Join our FB group for updates.
